OrgName: General Motors Holdings LLC, its subsidiaries and affiliates, excluding General Motors Financial Company, Inc.: customer data
activities: Information about identified or identifiable users of GM Europe's products and services, including Infotainment Services (European Customer Data), for which GM US acts as a data processor for its GM affiliated companies in Europe when it provides data hosting, technical support, or otherwise obtains incidental access to European Customer Data.  This includes European Customer Data collected online or offline either directly or indirectly.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: European Customer Data as defined in Description of Activities above.
recoursemech: International Centre for Dispute resolution, the international division of the American Arbitration Association (IDCR/AAA)at the following website: https://appsadr.org/webfile
